ygData.messageBody:
give me sometime.. im gonna start tailoring this weekendz... n will make ya druid a set of patchwork... first maybe.. .:) if i managed to get enough pelts.... n will work on more when i get better quality pelts...

Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Sereph
To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 11:35 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Level1-10s


Druids are:
3rd best Cleric, 3 best DD caster, 3rd best DOT caster, 3rd best AC buffer, 3rd base stat buffer, best damage shield, best teleport, best utility spellcaster, 2nd best charmer (if it is a Wood Elf), 2nd lousiest armor and 2nd lousiest HP.

They also don't have any XP penalties

Not a bad combo....

If you want to stick to a druid, I'll help you collect high quality pelts and get someone to make steel bonings so that you can get reinforced leather armor.

Leshrec wrote:

Talking bout druid, I was thinking of making one, maybe as a secondary character or a main one if I really like it. I think wolf form is cool, and druids get to teleport just as well as wizards, at one level earlier too. They get to heal,charm,dot and even have DD spells, although not as well as the specialist classes. Druids can also SoW and buff quite well... Well, if no one is gonna make a druid, i'll start one this weekend and see how it goes...
